inclusion_templates.rationale: Adult population per regulatory guidance for diabetes trials

inclusion_templates.criterion: Diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus for at least {duration} months
inclusion_templates.rationale: Ensure stable disease status and minimize misclassification
Optimal glycemic range for detecting treatment effect while maintaining safety
Ensure appropriate body composition for dosing and metabolic assessment

inclusion_templates.criterion: On stable dose of metformin >= {dose} mg/day for at least {weeks} weeks
inclusion_templates.rationale: Stable background therapy to isolate investigational drug effect

exclusion_templates.criterion: History of severe hypoglycemia requiring assistance within {months} months
exclusion_templates.rationale: Exclude high-risk hypoglycemia patients for safety
Renal function requirement for drug safety

exclusion_templates.criterion: Significant cardiovascular event (MI, stroke, hospitalization for unstable angina) within {months} months
exclusion_templates.rationale: Recent CV events may confound safety assessment and increase risk

exclusion_templates.criterion: Use of insulin within {weeks} weeks of screening
exclusion_templates.rationale: Exclude recent insulin users to maintain study population homogeneity

exclusion_templates.criterion: History of diabetic ketoacidosis or hyperosmolar hyperglycemic state
exclusion_templates.rationale: Exclude patients with history of severe metabolic complications

exclusion_templates.criterion: ALT or AST > {x}× ULN or total bilirubin > {y}× ULN
exclusion_templates.rationale: Hepatic function requirement for drug safety

inclusion_templates.rationale: Confirmed diagnosis required for study entry
Adequate performance status for study participation and safety

inclusion_templates.criterion: Adequate organ function as defined by: ANC >= {anc}, platelets >= {plt}, hemoglobin >= {hgb}, creatinine <= {cr}, bilirubin <= {bili}, AST/ALT <= {ast_alt}
inclusion_templates.rationale: Safety requirement for cytotoxic or investigational therapy

exclusion_templates.rationale: Exclude prior exposure to study drug class

exclusion_templates.criterion: Active autoimmune disease requiring systemic therapy
exclusion_templates.rationale: Immunotherapy safety consideration - risk of immune-related adverse events

exclusion_templates.criterion: Known active central nervous system metastases
exclusion_templates.rationale: Exclude unstable CNS disease unless treated and stable
exclusion_templates.flexibility: May allow if treated, stable for 4+ weeks, and not requiring steroids

exclusion_templates.criterion: Major surgery within {weeks} weeks of study treatment

inclusion_templates.rationale: Target population age range for cardiovascular studies
Documented reduced ejection fraction for HFrEF studies

exclusion_templates.criterion: Systolic blood pressure < {min} or > {max} mmHg at screening
exclusion_templates.rationale: Blood pressure safety limits for cardiovascular studies
Hepatic function requirement for drug metabolism

exclusion_templates.criterion: History of sustained ventricular tachycardia or ventricular fibrillation within {months} months

inclusion_templates.criterion: Able to provide written informed consent
Willing and able to comply with all study procedures and visit schedule
Women of childbearing potential must use acceptable contraception
inclusion_templates.rationale: Reproductive safety for women of childbearing potential

exclusion_templates.criterion: Participation in another interventional clinical trial within {weeks} weeks
exclusion_templates.rationale: Avoid confounding from other interventions and washout requirements

exclusion_templates.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to {study_drug} or any of its components
Any condition that in the opinion of the investigator would compromise participation
